Posts.Content: Hello everyone, my name is Anca and I was diagnosed with breast cancer at age  28. I finished chemotherapy two weeks ago and now  I 'm waiting surgery. For a while I fell my eyes very tired and dry, I really don't know how to explain this but it bothers me. Somebody else had this problem? P.SEnglish is not my mother tongue; please excuse any errors on my part.
Posts.Title: My eyes are dry and tired....

Posts.Content: Thanks "Boobylou" for your support and for the answer. Good luck
Posts.Title: My eyes are dry and tired....

Posts.Content: Yes you'r right it's the effect of chemotherapy. I was at the ophthalmologist and gave me some eye drops and she said this side effect is just for the moment. Thanks for your answer and have a good day
Posts.Title: My eyes are dry and tired....

Posts.Content: Hi "Peony12" thank you for your answer. You're right it is not easy but we must get through this, we are stronger than we know. Now I'm starting to get up, so I'm fine, next week I have the surgery.  Take care of yourself and good luck.
Posts.Title: My eyes are dry and tired....
